author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Utilize using to rename BranchDescription to the more accurate ProductDescription. A future change will involve creating a ProductDescription class and possibly relegating BranchDescription to be used internally for the root file format.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Relevant unit tests passed.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1190
title: Rename BranchDescription to ProductDescription
